com.caverock.androidsvg

Class IntegerParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caverock.androidsvg.IntegerParser

  • public class IntegerParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse a SVG/CSS 'integer' or hex number from a String. We use our own parser to gain a bit of speed. This routine is around twice as fast as the system one.
